text: The Kia K4 is a Compact car made by Kia from 2014 to 2020. == History and Features == The Kia K4 was previewed by the Kia K4 concept in the Beijing Auto Show in 2014 it was revealed at the Chengdu Auto Show in the same year. and was put on sale in October of the same year. The K4 shares its platform with the Hyundai Mistra and is positioned between the Kia K3 and the Kia K5 the car has a 1.6 turbocharged 1.8 and 2.0 liter petrol engines with a 6-speed manual and automatic transmission and a 7-speed DCT transmission a facelift of the car called the Kia K4 Cachet was launched in 2018. == Markets == The Kia K4 was made mainly for the Chinese market and was sold only there. == Discontinuation == The production of the Kia K4 ended in 2020 with no sucessor of the car being launched. == References == K4 (China) Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles
title: Kia K4 (China)
